title: Fragment, 13th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound weft twill (samite)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 27 x 22.9 cm (10 5/8 in. x 9 in.)
description: Ground divided into pearl roundels containing addorsed lions with tree in center. Rosettes in the interspaces. In yellow and brown.

Fragment, 13th century.
13th century. Medium: silk
